channel.title: TRAIN Conference
channel.description: TRAIN Conference (Calgary, Alberta, Canada) offers seminars and resources to equip and encourage Christian Education workers in their ministry areas.

item.title: Exhibitors and Attending Churches
item.description: Exhibitors have begun requesting space at the TRAIN 2005 Conference. Churches are starting to indicate their forthcoming participation in the conference, too. If your church is also planning on sending people then let us know and we'll be happy to add a hyperlink its website.

item.title: Conference Information
item.description: Details about the TRAIN 2005 Conference are now available. Our keynote speaker will be Randy Carter of Straight Talk Ministries. The Resource Centre will include displays & exhibits from a variety of publishers, including Cook Communications, Gospel Light, Group, Standard Publishing and Zondervan. There'll be a special Friday night session for youth and youth ministers & sponsors, too, with Robin Johnson and the AUC (Alliance University College) Worship Band.

item.title: Bonus Seminars -- Create a Volunteer Revolution
item.description: We are pleased to be able to partner this year with The Leadership Centre Willow Creek Canada to offer TRAIN 2005 registrants a bonus day on Friday at the Creating A Volunteer Revolution conference at no additional cost. One of the biggest needs expressed by church leaders is for more committed volunteers. Even more important, your people long to have eternal significance. That's why it's time for a revolution... one that helps you envision, empower and deploy every Christ-follower in your church to get off the sidelines and walk into the work of God's world-changing Kingdom!

item.title: Registration Information
item.description: Register for the TRAIN 2005 Conference using either the online or mail-in registration forms. Walk-in registrations will also be accepted, though some seminars may be full by then. A detailed fee schedule is available, as well as a list of nearby hotels for out out-of-town guests.

item.title: The TRAIN 2005 Conference is Now Over -- See You in 2006!
item.description: The TRAIN 2005 Conference is now over. We trust and pray that you found encouragement in the Lord, and that you will continue to stand firm in your faith, to speak boldly to those around you, and to serve faithfully where the Spirit has led you to. We look forward to doing more for you in 2006. The TRAIN 2006 Conference will be held November 3 & 4, 2006.
